meanings.definition: A type of phospholipid found in the brain and nervous tissue.
meanings.sent1: Cephalins are important for the brain and nerves.
meanings.sent2: The cephallins in the brain help with nerve function.
meanings.sent3: The cephallins in the brain like to have a chat with the nerves.
meanings.sent4: The cephallins in the brain are the guardians of nerve health.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the cephallins in the brain as tiny protectors of nerve cells.

meanings.definition: A group of lipoproteins that are involved in blood clotting.
meanings.sent1: Cephalins play a role in stopping bleeding.
meanings.sent2: The cephallins help in forming blood clots.
meanings.sent3: The cephallins in the blood are like little clotting superheroes.
meanings.sent4: In emergencies, cephallins rush to the scene to stop bleeding.
meanings.sent5: The cephallins in blood clotting are like puzzle pieces fitting together perfectly.
